channel.title: Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 36A and 36B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 36A and 36B. Exit 36A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 36B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.title: I-580 North/US-395 North - Exit 35
item.description: I-580 North/US-395 north at Exit 35 - E. Second St./Glendale Ave.

item.title: I-580 North/US-395 - Next Exits
item.description: Next 3 Exits on I-580 North/US-395: Mill St., E. Second St. and I-80.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 33 and 34
item.description: I-1580 North/US-395 north at Exit 33 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. Approaching Exit 34 - Mill St. Use Plumb Lane for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exit 33
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 33 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. A distance marker showing the next three Reno exits is on the left side of the picture. The next three exits are: Plumb Lane, Mill St., and E. Second St. Use the Plumb Lane exit for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 33
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 33 - Plumb Lane. Use Plumb Lane for Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 32 - Moana Lane.

item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 30 - Neil Road/Meadowood Mall Way.

item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 26 - Damonte Ranch Parkway.

item.description: Reno - Next 12 Exits on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway.

item.title: I-580 North Approaching Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 24. Use Exit 24 for Virginia City.

item.title: I-580 North Approaching Exit 24
item.description: I-580 North approaching Exit 2. Use Exit 24 for N. Lake Tahoe and Virginia City

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Reno
item.description: I-580/US-395 North - Reno, on overpass of Exit 16.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 16
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 16 - Old US 395. Use Exit 16 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 12
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 10 - Bellevue Road.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 10
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 10 - Eastlake Blvd. This is the southern terminus of Alt. US-395. Alt. US-395 was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Washoe County Line
item.description: Washoe County Line on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: End NV-439 North at I-80
item.description: End NV-439 North at I-80 East (Exit 32)

item.title: CH-447 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CH-447 North. Distance to Sand Pass Road, Squaw Valley Reservoir, Eagleville (California), Cedarville (California), and Alturas (California).

item.title: CH-447 North at CH-34
item.description: CH-447 North at CH-34 near Gerlach. Use CH-34 north for Leadville Canyon, Soldier Meadows, Boulder Reservoir, and Vya.

item.title: CH-447 North Approaching CH-34
item.description: CH-447 North approaching CH-34 near Gerlach. Use CH-34 north for Vya; CH-447 North for Cedarville (California).

item.title: Begin NV-447 - Gerlach
item.description: Begin NV-447 South in Gerlach. Washoe County 447 ends here.

item.title: Begin Washoe County 447 - Gerlach
item.description: Begin Washoe County 447 in Gerlach. NV-447 northbound ends here.

item.title: NV-447 North - Gerlach
item.description: Entering Gerlach on NV-447 North.

item.title: NV-447 North - Empire
item.description: NV-447 north at Empire.

item.title: NV-447 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-447 north. Distance to Nixon, Empire and Gerlach.

item.title: NV-447 North at NV-446
item.description: NV-447 North at NV-446 junction. Use NV-446 to Pyramid Lake and Sutcliffe. Continue north on NV-447 for Nixon and Gerlach.

item.title: NV-447 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-447 North. Distance to Nixon, Pyramid Lake, and Gerlach.

item.description: Begin NV-447 North in Wadsworth

item.description: NV-427 West at NV-447 North in Wadsworth. Use NV-447 north for Pyramid Lake and Gerlach. Continue west on NV-427 for Reno.

item.description: NV-427 West approaching NV-447 in Wadsworth.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 32
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 32 - NV-439/USA Parkway. USA Parkway was recently completed in 2017 and is a four lane highway that connects I-80 and US-50.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 32
item.description: I-80 approaching Exit 32 - NV-439/USA Parkway.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-80 east at the California-Nevada state line. I-80 through Nevada is called the Purple Heart Trail. This sign is a new style of welcome sign.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). This is the north end of I-580.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exits 68AB and 69
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 68A - I-80 East; Exit 68B - I-80 West, and Exit 69 (exit number not shown) - Oddie Blvd.

item.description: I-580/US-395 North on Exit 56 Offramp. Turn right for NV-431 East (via NV-341) to Virginia City. Turn left for NV-431 West to North Lake Tahoe.

item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 56 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.description: Washoe County Line on I-580/US-395 North.

item.description: US-395 north approaching Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). The new signs along the US-395 freeway are using the Clearview font.

item.description: US-395 north approaching Exit 68A - I-80 East; Exit 68B - I-80 West, and Exit 69 (exit number not shown) - Oddie Blvd.

item.description: US-395 north approaching Exit 65 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. A distance marker showing the next three Reno exits is on the left side of the picture. item.title: Damonte Ranch Parkway West at US-395
item.description: Damonte Ranch Parkway West at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Reno. Continue under highway for US-395 south to Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North - Exit 59
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 59 - Damonte Ranch Parkway.

item.title: NV-431 East at US-395
item.description: NV-431 east at US-395. This is the southern end of the current US-395 freeway. The section between NV-431 and Washoe Lake is expected to be completed in late 2012. For US-395 north to Reno continue straight. In late 2012, the right lanes will be for US-395 south to Carson City and South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-431 East - Mount Rose Summit
item.description: NV-431 East at Mount Rose Summit - Elevation 8900 Feet. Mount Rose Summit is one of the few Sierra Nevada passes in Nevada, and is the highest pass open year round in the Sierra Nevada.

item.title: End NV-431 West at NV-28
item.description: End NV-431 West at NV-28 in Incline Village.

item.title: NV-28 East at NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east at NV-431 in Incline Village.

item.title: NV-28 East Approaching NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east approaching NV-431. Use NV-431 for Reno (the Mount Rose Highway); continue east on NV-28 for Sierra Nevada College.

item.title: NV-28 East Approaching NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east approaching NV-431 (Mount Rose Highway).

item.title: NV-28 East - Incline Village
item.description: Entering Incline Village (Elevation 6390) on NV-28 east. Incline Village is a community on the Nevada side of Lake Tahoe on the north shore.

item.title: NV-28 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on NV-28 east on the north shore of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-427 South - Leaving Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation
item.description: Leaving the Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation on NV-427 south. The Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation is home to the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe.

item.title: NV-427 South - Truckee River
item.description: NV-427 south crossing the Truckee River in Wadsworth.

item.description: NV-427 east at NV-447 in Wadsworth.

item.description: NV-427 East at NV-447 North to the University of Nevada S-S Field Station and Pyramid Lake.

item.title: NV-427 East at NV-447
item.description: NV-427 east at NV-447 north. Use NV-447 north for Pyramid Lake and Gerlach. Continue east on NV-427 for Fernley.

item.title: NV-427 East Approaching NV-447
item.description: NV-427 East approaching NV-447 in Wadsworth. Turn north on NV-447 for Pyramid Lake and Gerlach.

item.title: Entering Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation - NV-427 East
item.description: Entering Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation on NV-427 East. Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation is home to the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe.

item.title: Begin NV-427 East
item.description: Begin NV-427 East at I-80 (Exit 43). NV-427 runs from Exit 43 on I-80 into Fernley.

item.title: I-80 East Offramp at NV-427
item.description: I-80 East Offramp (Exit 43) at NV-427 East. Turn left for NV-427 (not signed) for Wadsworth and Pyramid Lake. Turn right for Cantlon Drive.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 21
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 21 - Greg St./Vista Blvd. This is the first exit in the Reno/Sparks area westbound. The Sierra Nevada are visible in the background of the photo.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance To Truckee and Sacramento
item.description: Last distance marker on I-80 west in Nevada. Distance to Truckee and Sacramento. This is one mile from California.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 1 - Verdi. This is the last Nevada exit on I-80. Exit 1 is actually between Mile 2 and 3.

item.title: NV-8A East - Travel At Your Own Risk
